A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: SPOILERS FOLLOW-- Just bad; I didn't like the 'comedy' at the start such as Luke throwing the lightsaber behind him\, didn't like the Finn and Rose plot at all\, Laura Dern's character was so unlikable that her change to good wasn't fully effective (why didn't she just tell Poe the actual plan??)\, too much CGI\, it ruined General Hux completely and wtf was that Mary Poppins stuff??
